original_title: Ranil Wickremesinghe In Uganda To Represent Sri Lanka At NAM Summit
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe reached Kampala, Uganda today to attend the 19th Heads of State Summit of the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM).

19th Summit of the Heads of State and Government of the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM), a two-day conference, scheduled for January 19 and 20, will host leaders from 120 member states under the theme "Deepening Cooperation For Shared Global Affluence"
Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) was officially founded in 1961 drawing on the Bandung Principles, and Such principles were adopted later as the main goals and objectives of the policy of non-alignment.
